think_procedure.step2: Understand the normal operation of 'temp_file_limit', which limits the amount of disk space that can be used for temporary files.
think_procedure.step3: Investigate if 'temp_file_limit' has any special values that alter its normal operation.
think_procedure.step4: Discover that setting 'temp_file_limit' to -1 disables the limit, allowing unlimited disk space usage for temporary files.
think_procedure.step5: Conclude that 'temp_file_limit' is a special knob due to its special value -1 that changes its behavior significantly.
